plugin.name: Clay Buster
plugin.creator: phrack
plugin.description: Practice shooting clays with a new clay launched every 7 seconds.

plugin.name: Cowboy Fast Draw
plugin.creator: phrack
plugin.description: Simulates Cowboy Fast Draw #3B targets and timers in practice mode.

plugin.name: Pistol Isometrics
plugin.creator: phrack
plugin.description: Walk through a series of shoot and hold exercises to strenghten muscles activated when accurately shooting a firearm.

plugin.name: Shot to Click
plugin.creator: phrack
plugin.description: Play click-based Flash games using this exercise, which converts a shot on the arena to a mouse click on the screen the arena was calibrated on.
